channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- GeForce NOW for Android mobile and TV app
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- GeForce NOW for Android mobile and TV app

item.title: CVE-2023-31014|2024-08-02T14:45:24.862Z -- nvidia -- geforce%20now%20for%20android%20mobile%20and%20tv%20app
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Now for Android contains a vulnerability in the game launcher component, where a malicious application on the same device can process the implicit intent meant for the streamer component. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to limited information disclosure, denial of service, and code execution.
